election_record.label: New York 1818 State Senate, Middle District

sub_unit.name: Albany
sub_unit.note: The official canvass of votes lists 979 votes for Arunah Metcalf though the town votes add up to 976.

sub_unit.name: One
sub_unit.note: The Albany Argus (Albany, NY) lists 45 votes for Moses Austin.
The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY) and Daily Advertiser lists 42 votes for Moses Austin, 46 for Arunah Metcalf, and 48 for Selah Strong.

sub_unit.name: Two
sub_unit.note: The Albany Argus (Albany, NY) lists 46 votes for Moses Austin in Ward Two.

sub_unit.name: Four
sub_unit.note: The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY) and Daily Advertiser lists 36 votes for William Ross.

sub_unit.name: Five
sub_unit.note: The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY) and Daily Advertiser lists 27 votes for Arunah Metcalf.

sub_unit.name: Chenango
sub_unit.note: Arunah Metcalf received 48 votes as Arnuna Medcalf and 1 vote as Aruna Medcalt.
The Norwich Journal (Norwich, NY) and the Oxford Gazette (Oxford, NY) list 970 votes for Martin G. Schuneman.

sub_unit.name: Columbia
sub_unit.note: Selah Strong received 1 vote as Senah Strong.

The town votes given here, taken from The Northern Whig, May 5, add up to 747 votes for William Ross, 1154 for Moses Austin, 884 for Arunah Metcalf, and 1299 for Selah Strong. The Official Canvass of Votes, however, lists 738 votes for William Ross, 1162 for Moses Austin, 884 for Arunah Metcalf, and 1300 for Selah Strong.
The Albany Argus (Albany, NY) and the Patriot list 757 votes for William Ross, 1153 for Moses Austin, and 1199 for Selah Strong.

sub_unit.name: Sullivan
sub_unit.note: The Plebeian lists 199 votes for Moses Austin though the town votes add up to 209.

sub_unit.name: Shandakan
sub_unit.note: The Plebeian lists 3 votes for Arunah Metcalf.

election_record.reference: Utica Patriot and Patrol (Utica, NY). May 12, 1818.
Historical Album of Orleans County, N.Y. New York: Sanford and, 1879. 257.
